! Title: Brian's copycat search results
! Description: Copycat sites, that blatantly copy or source their content from other sites
! Homepage: https://github.com/b-turchyn/blocklists

! 2023-01-16: Migration to scripted blocklist builder
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain*="appsloveworld.com"]
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="appsloveworld.com"])
appsloveworld.com
! 2023-01-16: Migration to scripted blocklist builder

coderedirect.com
